trans-unit.source: Provides information about the worker process that hosts ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 提供裝載 ASP.NET 之背景工作處理序的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data, and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料，健全狀況事件型別和提供者類型負責處理這項資料。

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation> class contain information that is obtained using any of the types derived from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent> type.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation>類別包含使用任何一種衍生自取得的資訊<xref:System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent>型別。

trans-unit.source: Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access protected information provided by this type.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式需要存取受保護的資訊，此類型所提供的適當權限。

trans-unit.source: The following example is an excerpt of the configuration file you could use to enable ASP.NET to log error events that contain process information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例是您可以使用以包含處理序資訊的記錄檔錯誤事件中啟用 ASP.NET 的組態檔的摘錄。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。

trans-unit.source: For an example of creating a custom event class, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 如需建立自訂的事件類別的範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The following example has two parts.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例有兩個部分。

trans-unit.source: The first is an excerpt of a configuration file that enables ASP.NET to use a custom event that uses the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation> type.
trans-unit.target: 第一個是讓 ASP.NET 可以使用自訂事件使用的組態檔的摘錄<xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation>型別。

trans-unit.source: The second shows how to implement the custom event.
trans-unit.target: 第二個示範如何實作自訂事件。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your custom event is raised at the proper time, that is, when the equivalent system health event it replaces would be raised.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您的自訂事件在引發適當的時間，也就是時就會引發取代的對等系統健全狀況事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to implement a custom event that uses the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何實作自訂事件使用<xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation>型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the account name for the worker process.
trans-unit.target: 取得背景工作處理序的帳戶名稱。

trans-unit.source: The worker process account name.
trans-unit.target: 背景工作處理序帳戶名稱。

trans-unit.source: Your application needs the appropriate permissions to access the information provided by this property.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式需要適當的權限來存取這個屬性所提供的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain the process account name.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何取得處理序帳戶名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter" /> that contains the tab and indentation settings used to format the Web health event information.
trans-unit.target: 包含用來將 Web 健康情況事件資訊格式化之定位和縮排設定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventFormatter" />。

trans-unit.source: Formats the application information.
trans-unit.target: 格式化應用程式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation.FormatToString%2A> method provides a uniform format for event information, which is useful if the event data must be logged and later presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebProcessInformation.FormatToString%2A>方法可為事件的資訊，這非常有用，如果事件資料必須記錄，並向使用者顯示更新版本提供統一的格式。

trans-unit.source: The method is called internally when the provider invokes one of the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 當提供者會叫用的其中一個方法會在內部呼叫<xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to format custom information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定自訂資訊的格式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the process identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理序識別項。

trans-unit.source: The process identifier.
trans-unit.target: 處理序識別項。

trans-unit.source: This is the identifier of the worker process that hosts ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 這是裝載 ASP.NET 工作者處理序的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain the process identifier.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何取得處理序識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the process.
trans-unit.target: 取得處理序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the process.
trans-unit.target: 處理序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is the name of the worker process that hosts ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 這是裝載 ASP.NET 工作者處理序的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to obtain the process name.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何取得處理序名稱。
